references.paper_title: Structured denoising diffusion models in discrete state-spaces

references.paper_title: Discrete diffusion language modeling by estimating the ratios of the data distribution

references.paper_title: Simple and effective masked diffusion language models

references.paper_title: Generative modeling on manifolds through mixture of riemannian diffusion processes
